items.sentence: I think I\'ve persuaded Tom to donate some money.
I think Tom is from Australia, but I\'m not sure.
I think Tom probably doesn\'t like you very much.
I think it\'s pretty obvious that Tom likes Mary.
I think it\'s time for me to move to the suburbs.
Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.
Tom listened patiently as the old man rambled on.
Tom lived next door to us until three months ago.
Tom looked at a snowflake through his microscope.
Tom managed to get on the school basketball team.
